title: Microsoft Corp. stock underperforms Tuesday when compared to competitors
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       slid 2.15% to $406.32 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around dismal trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 1.37% to 4,953.17 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 1.35% to 38,272.75. This was the stock's second consecutive day of losses. Microsoft Corp. closed $14.50 below its 52-week high ($420.82), which the company achieved on February 9th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Tuesday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       fell 1.13% to $185.04, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       fell 1.59% to $146.37, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       fell 1.62% to $145.14. Trading volume (27.2 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 25.4 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use.
